short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to save ChatGPT Q&A page as markdown

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you download the ChatGPT Q&A page to your hard drive. If you click on the icon of this extension or press Alt + Shift + 5, the current ChatGPT Q&A page will be saved into a markdown file into your Downloads folder.
